title: COOFANDY Men's 2 Pack Gym Workout Shorts 7 Inch Quick Dry Athletic Shorts Lightweight Running Shorts with Pockets
description: Lightweight, 4-way stretch fabric with moisture-wicking and quick-dry technology makes the 7-inch gym shorts comfortable and stress-free during workouts and other activities

Mens workouts shorts design in regular fit, featuring elasticized waist with adjustable drawstring, solid color, 1 back zipper pocket ; 2 side pockets prevent your phone from falling out when you exercise; Open flap design allows more movement for weight training.
You can pair this 7 inch athletic shorts with tank tops/t shirts for workout or leisure all day long.

Quick dry gym shorts great for all seasons, suitable for workout, gym, athletic, running, jogging, fitness, bodybuilding, basketball, squats, lunges, boxing wear, training, exercise, vacation, fishing, outdoor leisure or trendy casual wear.
Machine washable. US sizes. Please check our size chart before ordering
